name: Gaseous Form
text: The damage reduction changes to DR 10/epic and magic, and the fly speed increases to 30 feet. The target can expand itself as a free action, filling an area equal to double its normal space and height (a Medium creature fills a 10-foot-by-10-foot space to a height of about 10 feet) and blocking vision as obscuring mist. Returning from expanded to normal size is also a free action.

sections.name: Augmented
sections.text: If you expend two uses of mythic power, the target can shift into or out of gaseous form as a move action.
